Bosses.Name: Phase 1
Bosses.InDepthStrategy:
Kill order is BLM > PLD > WHM > BRD > THF > WAR/RNG.
Interrupt BLM "Mog Flare" when possible. Must kill at least 3 adds to survive P2 opening.
Bosses.QuickStrategy:
Kill order is BLM > PLD > WHM > BRD > THF > WAR/RNG.
Interrupt BLM "Mog Flare" when possible. Must kill at least 3 adds to survive P2 opening.
